dataSummaryText: This study explores the interaction between deforestation and precipitation patterns in the Amazon. Utilizing robust analytical methodologies, the student team investigates variables and identifies significant patterns, providing solid data on the implications of deforestation for the region's rainfall regime. The project is aimed at a diverse audience, including academics, environmental professionals, and individuals interested in climatic and environmental data. Data visualizations are designed to enhance the interpretation and understanding of the findings, fostering well-informed discussions on sustainability and environmental conservation policies.
contactDescription: Got any questions? Feel free to contact us!
gfc_correlacao_geral_title: Correlation between Deforestation and Overall Precipitation
gfc_desmatamento_totais_title: Total Amazon Area Deforested by Year (km²)
gfc_desmatamento_valores_totais_title: Amazon Area Already Deforested by State (km²)
